DOC.detailed_description: We propose conduct cross-sectional study 60 participant 18-30 year age undergo research PET/CT . The purpose study investigate relationship Brown Adipose Tissue ( BAT ) , adiponectin/leptin ( A/L ) ratio , component metabolic syndrome young adult . This study part large study aim understanding mechanism brown adipose tissue potential protective factor metabolic dysfunction .
DOC.criteria: Males female , 1830 year age enrollment , obese ( BMI great equal 30 kg/m2 , weight less 159 kg ) healthy Without medication endocrine/genetic disorder know affect weight . Participants may insulin resistance , impair glucose tolerance , dyslipidemia , hypertension . Anyone refuse participation . A genetic syndrome endocrine disorder know cause obesity ( PraderWilli , Cushing Syndrome , Leptin deficiency , etc. ) . Use following medication : psychotropics , sulphonylurea , thiazolidinediones , insulin , glucocorticoid , antineoplastic agent , angiotensin receptor blocker , angiotensinconverting enzyme inhibitor . Pregnancy history pregnancy . Active infectious disease History CVD stroke previous 36 month Total cholesterol 300 mg/dl , triglycerides 400 mg/dl Blood pressure 140/90 mmHg Fasting plasma glucose 126 mg/dl . Diabetes mellitus , type 1 2 .
